decks.notes: The deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures with specific abilities to create a toolbox of options for different situations. It utilizes cards like Chord of Calling and Eldritch Evolution to search for and put these creatures onto the battlefield. The creatures in the deck have synergistic abilities that can generate value, disrupt opponents, and provide combo potential with cards like Yawgmoth, Thran Physician. The deck aims to outvalue opponents by leveraging the versatility and efficiency of its creature toolbox to control the game and win through various combo interactions.

This deck focuses on using aggression and disruption to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Utilizing fast mana sources and efficient removal spells, it aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dauthi Voidwalker to apply constant pressure. Key cards like Thoughtseize and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker help control the opponent's resources and maintain tempo. With a mix of early game aggression and late game finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, the deck aims to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures from the graveyard using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Tainted Indulgence. Fallaji Archaeologist helps to facilitate this strategy by discarding cards like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. Solitude and Grief provide removal and disruption to the opponent's strategy, while Ephemerate can be used to repeatedly blink key creatures for added value. Faithful Mending allows for card draw and graveyard manipulation, while Prismatic Ending and Force of Negation provide additional interaction. The deck aims to win quickly through a powerful combo finish.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on disruption and removal to control the board and tempo of the game. The deck contains a mix of hand disruption spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Damnation. The win condition revolves around using powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and The One Ring to finish off the opponent. The deck's strategy is to grind out the opponent's resources while maintaining card advantage and eventually overwhelming them with powerful threats.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to deploy powerful giant creatures like Primeval Titan and Cultivator Colossus. It utilizes the synergy between lands like Urza's Saga and Amulet of Vigor to generate a massive amount of mana and combo off to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes utility lands like The One Ring and Vesuva to further strengthen its board presence and consistency. By efficiently utilizing its lands and creatures, this deck aims to win the game through explosive plays and overwhelming the opponent with its powerful combo synergy.

The deck focuses on quickly milling the opponent's library using cards like Archive Trap, Hedron Crab, and Ruin Crab while also controlling the board with counterspells and removal such as Solitude and Supreme Verdict. Teferi, Time Raveler and Ashiok, Dream Render disrupt the opponent's game plan while Jace, the Perfected Mind provides card advantage. The deck also utilizes land destruction with Field of Ruin to disrupt the opponent's mana base. The combination of mill, control, and disruption makes it difficult for the opponent to effectively execute their strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach to create powerful explosive combos, allowing you to repeatedly cast spells from your graveyard and generate massive card advantage. By utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to fuel your graveyard, you can overwhelm your opponent with a flurry of spells and burn damage. Blood Moon acts as disruption against multicolor decks, while cards like Spell Pierce and Lightning Bolt provide additional control and removal options. Jegantha, the Wellspring serves as a useful companion to further enhance your strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly equipping Colossus Hammer onto creatures like Ornithopter or Inkmoth Nexus to deal massive damage. The key concept revolves around combining equipment, artifacts, and creatures to create a powerful combo that overwhelms the opponent. By efficiently tutoring for key pieces with cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Urza's Saga, the deck aims to assemble its combo quickly and efficiently, often catching opponents off guard with unexpected burst damage. The inclusion of cards like Forge Anew and Steelshaper's Gift complement the main strategy, enhancing the deck's consistency and versatility.

This deck focuses on assembling the "Amulet Titan" combo, using cards like Primeval Titan, Amulet of Vigor, and Urza's Saga to generate huge amounts of mana and quickly put powerful threats on the board. The key strategy involves ramping up mana production with land-bouncing effects and maximizing the use of powerful lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and The Mycosynth Gardens. By carefully sequencing plays and utilizing tutor effects like Expedition Map and Tolaria West, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with massive creatures and potent land triggers to secure victory.

The deck focuses on creating a powerful combo using cards that interact with each other in unique ways. It utilizes cards like Indomitable Creativity and Leyline Binding to control the board and set up for big plays with cards like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Iona, Shield of Emeria. The deck also includes a mix of control and card draw spells like Teferi, Time Raveler and Expressive Iteration to help dig for key pieces. The goal is to be creative in assembling combos and outsmarting opponents with unexpected plays.

This deck focuses on assembling a wide range of creature tools to create powerful combos and synergies. It utilizes cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide, Yawgmoth, Thran Physician, and Agatha's Soul Cauldron to generate value and control the board. With Chord of Calling providing tutor capability, the deck can find key creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse or Hapatra, Vizier of Poisons to further its game plan. The deck also features mana ramp and fixing to ensure smooth gameplay and consistent performance. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a versatile toolbox of creatures and win through smart plays and efficient combos.

This deck focuses on quickly and efficiently reanimating powerful creatures from the graveyard, such as Griselbrand, using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Atraxa, Grand Unifier to gain advantage over the opponent. It also includes disruptive elements like Grief and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's hand, and cards like Ephemerate and Solitude for additional removal and protection. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats before they can respond effectively, leading to a fast and explosive win condition.

The deck focuses on utilizing Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate to quickly reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Fallaji Archaeologist. Faithful Mending and Thoughtseize help filter through the deck and disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Solitude and Prismatic Ending provide removal options. The deck aims to assemble the combo pieces to quickly bring back game-ending threats and overwhelm the opponent with powerful reanimated creatures. It also includes a mix of lands to ensure consistency and stability in executing the combo.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly playing aggressive threats like Dragon's Rage Channeler, Ragavan, and Murktide Regent while using efficient spells like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat to control the board and protect your creatures. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Counterspell and Spell Pierce to disrupt your opponent's game plan. With efficient card draw and selection spells like Preordain and Expressive Iteration, the deck aims to maintain a strong tempo and pressure your opponent into making mistakes. The mana base is optimized for consistency and flexibility.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Indomitable Creativity card alongside cards like Archon of Cruelty and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to quickly assemble powerful combo plays. By sacrificing smaller tokens or creatures, players can cheat out massive threats onto the battlefield and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Persist and Thoughtseize help control the opponent's hand and board state, while Lightning Bolt provides additional removal and reach. The deck aims to be quick and efficient in assembling its combo pieces while disrupting the opponent's strategy.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature bombs like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Grief, supported by disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to close out games quickly. The deck utilizes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Not Dead After All to maintain card advantage and pressure opponents efficiently. With a mix of disruptive spells, versatile creatures, and impactful threats, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and win the game quickly.
